title: Update: Startups as a Band / Startups as a Service

quotes.quote: Dreamer, you know you are a dreamer. Well, can you put your hands in your head? Oh no!
quotes.speaker: Unknown

quotes.quote: Startups are hard and you can’t do it alone. But finding the right team and having clear roles and responsibilities is key to success.
quotes.speaker: Unknown

quotes.quote: Still cannot do it alone. At least with a team of four, you can find your Ringo.
quotes.speaker: Unknown

author: David Thyresson
